title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chris Mannix on Celts Advantage, Udoka Difference, Fake Q's
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chris Mannix on Celts Advantage, Udoka Difference, Fake Q's
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), including if Draymond Green’s podcast is hurting his Finals performance, if Dustin Johnson deserves heat for joining the Saudi LIV tour, why Jack Del Rio calling the January 6th attack on the Capitol a “dust up” is so hypocritical, and if LeBron would make a good NBA owner. 

Then, SI Senior NBA Writer - and host of Boxing with Chris Mannix - Chris Mannix and Colin discuss how the Celtics have taken control of the Finals through 3 games (15:00), if the Warriors are done (17:00), if Golden State should make serious roster changes if they lose (20:00), why the Celtics severely struggled early under Ime Udoka (27:00), how Udoka got his players to buy in (29:00), and why Brad Stevens deserves credit for stepping aside (32:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
